mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN LEVEL -1 > 0 then CONCAT(CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', level-1),'<'), board.board_title) ELSE board.board_title END AS board_title, board.articleNO, board.parentNO, result.level, board.board_content, board.member_id, date_format(board.board_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as board_write_date FROM (SELECT function_hierarchical() AS articleNO, @level AS level FROM (SELECT @start_with:=0, @articleNO:= @start_with, @level:=0) tbl JOIN t_board) result JOIN t_board board ON board.articleNO = result.articleNO
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(articleNO, board_title, board_content, board_image, member_id) values(#{articleNO}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_image}, #{member_id})
mapper.delete: delete from t_board where articleNO in ( SELECT articleNO FROM t_board WHERE articleNO = #{articleNO} OR parentNO = #{articleNO})
